While credited as a Tom and Jerry cartoon, this is not the cat-and-mouse team but an earlier Mutt-and-Jeff rip-off featuring them going about to survive in today's turbulent economy. In the end, Jerry MEA Culpa puts Tom into a ball ornament after getting busy with his new sweetheart. Tom picks it up thinking that Jerry had left him something to play with.

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie was decent produced though.
That being said, as a piece of film history it's mostly important to see how far we've come and how this genre has developed.
